section.title: The Agreement Work Effort Applications help screen
section.para: This screen is used to link a work effort to the whole agreement or an individual agreement item.

section.title: How do I add a work effort to an agreement?

listitem.para: Use the drop down box to select the 'Agreement Item Seq Id'
Use the lookup to select the 'Workeffort Id'
The new entry is displayed in the lower part of the screen

section.title: How do I update a work effort for an agreement?
section.para: Work efforts can only be added or deleted. They cannot be updated

section.title: How do I delete a work effort from an agreement?

listitem.para: Press the 'Delete' button for the entry that needs to be deleted
